title: Toxicity of particles and chemicals released from surgical face masks to the model aquatic organism Daphnia magna
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,546-560
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00343D, Paper
Oluwadamilola Pikuda, Laura M. Hernandez, Dahyun Kyung, Qiqing Chen, Jun-Ray Macairan, Lan Liu, Xiaoyu Gao, St√©phane Bayen, Subhasis Ghoshal, Dimitrios Berk, Nathalie Tufenkji
The use of single-use face masks during the COVID-19 pandemic has resulted in indiscriminate disposal of face masks, some of which end up in the aquatic environment.
